card.name: Adorable Kitten
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. You gain life equal to the result.

card.name: Aerial Toastmaster

card.name: By Gnome Means
Chivalrous Chevalier
card.property: Flying When Chivalrous Chevalier enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand unless you compliment an opponent.

card.name: Do-It-Yourself Seraph
card.property: Flying Whenever Do-It-Yourself Seraph attacks, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle. Do-It-Yourself Seraph has the text box of each card exiled with Do-It-Yourself Seraph in addition to its own.

card.name: Gimme Five
card.property: You gain 1 life for each person who high-fives you in the next thirty seconds. Each player in a silver-bordered game who high-fives you gains 1 life. (Offer high fives. Don't hit people.)

card.name: GO TO JAIL
card.property: When GO TO JAIL enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until GO TO JAIL leaves the battlefield. At the beginning of the upkeep of the exiled card's owner, that player rolls two six-sided dice. If they roll doubles, sacrifice GO TO JAIL.

card.name: Half-Kitten, Half-
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, Augment {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Humming-
card.property: Flying Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, Augment {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jackknight
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Jackknight. If that artifact is a Contraption, Jackknight gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from black borders (Nothing with a black border can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from even collector numbers (Nothing with an even collector number can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from loose lips (Nothing with an open mouth in its artwork can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from odd collector numbers (Nothing with an odd collector number can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from two-word names (Nothing with exactly two words in its name can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature. Hyphenated words are one word.)

card.name: Knight of the Kitchen Sink
card.property: First strike, protection from watermarks (Nothing with a watermark can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to this creature.)

card.name: Knight of the Widget
card.property: Vigilance Knight of the Widget's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Order of the Widget watermarks among permanents you control.

card.name: Midlife Upgrade
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X Contraptions. Assemble X plus one Contraptions. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Oddly Uneven
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy each creature with an odd number of words in its name. (Hyphenated words are one word.) • Destroy each creature with an even number of words in its name.

card.name: Old Guard
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature without reminder text. (Reminder text is still any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)

card.name: Ordinary Pony
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Horse creature you control that wasn't put onto the battlefield with this ability this turn, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Rhino-
card.property: Whenever this creature blocks, Augment {3}{W} ({3}{W}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Riveting Rigger
card.property: When Riveting Rigger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Riveting Rigger and it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Rules Lawyer
card.property: State-based actions don't apply to you or other permanents you control. (You don't lose the game due to having 0 or less life or drawing from an empty library. Your creatures aren't destroyed due to damage or deathtouch and aren't put into a graveyard due to having 0 or less toughness. Your planeswalkers aren't put into a graveyard if they have 0 loyalty. You don't put a legendary permanent into a graveyard if you control two with the same name. Counters aren't removed from your permanents due to game rules. Permanents you control attached or combined illegally remain on the battlefield. For complete rules and regulations, see rule 704.)

card.name: Sacrifice Play
card.property: A person outside the game chooses an attacking or blocking creature target opponent controls. That player sacrifices that creature.

card.name: Shaggy Camel
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Side Quest
card.property: Target player in a silver-bordered game you can see from your seat gains control of target creature you control until your next turn. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put two +1/+1 counters on that creature. (A creature is on the battlefield of only the game its controller is playing.)

card.name: Success!
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a host or has augment, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Teacher's Pet
card.property: {2} {W}, Sacrifice Teacher's Pet: Search your library for a card with augment, combine it with target host you control, then shuffle.

card.name: Animate Library
card.property: Enchant your library Enchanted library is an artifact creature on the battlefield with power and toughness each equal to the number of cards in it. It's still a library. If enchanted library would leave the battlefield, exile Animate Library instead.

card.name: Blurry Beeble
card.property: Blurry (This creature can be blocked only if defending player was wearing glasses as it was cast.) Whenever Blurry Beeble deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Chipper Chopper
card.property: Flying When Chipper Chopper enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Chipper Chopper and it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Clocknapper
card.property: When Clocknapper enters the battlefield, choose beginning phase, precombat main phase, combat phase, postcombat main phase, or ending phase. Steal that phase from target player during their next turn. (That phase occurs as though it's your turn instead.)

card.name: Crafty Octopus
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, this creature assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Crow Storm
card.property: Create a 1/2 blue Bird creature token with flying named Storm Crow. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

card.name: Defective Detective
card.property: Defective Detective can't be blocked. When Defective Detective enters the battlefield, a person outside the game looks at target opponent's hand and chooses a card from it. That player reveals that card.

card.name: Five-Finger Discount
card.property: Put target nonland permanent into your hand. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color the next time you cast that card.

card.name: Graveyard Busybody
card.property: All graveyards are also your graveyards. Graveyard Busybody's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards with flavor text in your graveyards.

card.name: Half-Shark, Half-
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Augment {5}{U} ({5}{U}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Incite Insight
card.property: Assemble X Contraptions. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Kindly Cognician
card.property: Spells you cast that refer to artifacts or Contraptions in their rules text cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Magic Word
card.property: Enchant creature As Magic Word enters the battlefield, choose a word. Whisper the chosen word: Tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Mer Man
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.

card.name: More or Less

card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it has an Agents of S.N.E.A.K. watermark, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Socketed Sprocketer
card.property: {T}: Uninstall all results from Socketed Sprocketer, then roll a six-sided die. Install the result on Socketed Sprocketer. (Put the die on this card.) You may uninstall a result from Socketed Sprocketer to use it for a die you rolled. Uninstall a 6 from Socketed Sprocketer: Draw a card.

card.name: Spell Suck
card.property: Counter target spell, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Spy Eye
card.property: Flying Whenever Spy Eye deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card from that player's library.

card.name: Suspicious Nanny
card.property: Whenever Suspicious Nanny deals combat damage to a player, it reassembles target Contraption that player controls. (Gain control of it and move it onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Time Out
card.property: Roll a six-sided die. Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the result.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. • Target creature can't be blocked this turn. • Draw a card. If that card's art is by Wayne England, you may reveal it and draw another card. • Assemble a Contraption.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Untap two target permanents. • Tap each permanent target player controls with exactly one word in its name. • Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards. • Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Draw a card from an opponent's library. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1. • Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Return target permanent to its controller's hand. • Draw two cards, then discard a card. • Change the target of target spell with a single target. • Turn over target nontoken creature.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Counter target black-bordered spell. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Untap each permanent you control with a watermark. • Roll two six-sided dice. Target player mills X cards, where X is the total of those results.

card.name: Very Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Scry 3. • Create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token with menace. • Add or subtract 1 or one from a number or number word on target spell or permanent until end of turn. • Return all artifacts target player controls to their owner's hand.

card.name: Wall of Fortune
card.property: Defender You may tap an untapped Wall you control to have any player reroll a die that player rolled.

card.name: Hangman
card.property: As Hangman enters the battlefield, secretly note a word with six to eight letters. {1}: Target player who doesn't control Hangman guesses the noted word or an unguessed letter in that word. If they guess wrong, put a +1/+1 counter on Hangman. Any player may activate this ability. When a player guesses the noted word or all of its letters, sacrifice Hangman.

card.name: Hazmat Suit (Used)
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace. Whenever a player's skin or fingernail touches enchanted creature, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Hoisted Hireling
card.property: Hoisted Hireling has flying as long as it's being held above the battlefield.

card.name: Inhumaniac
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a six-sided die. On a 3 or 4, put a +1/+1 counter on Inhumaniac. On a 5 or higher, put two +1/+1 counters on it. On a 1, remove all +1/+1 counters from Inhumaniac.

card.name: Masterful Ninja
card.property: Haste Reveal Masterful Ninja from your hand: Masterful Ninja is on the battlefield and in your hand until end of turn. {1}{B}: Masterful Ninja gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ninja
card.property: You may activate Ninja's augment ability any time you could cast an instant. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, Augment {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as—oh, never mind.)

card.name: Old-Fashioned Vampire
card.property: Flying Old-Fashioned Vampire gets +2/+2 and has deathtouch as long as it's dark outdoors.

card.name: Over My Dead Bodies
card.property: Creature cards in graveyards can attack and block as though they were on the battlefield, can block or be blocked only by creature cards in graveyards, are Zombies in addition to their other types, and have undeathtouch. (If they would deal damage to a creature card, exile that creature card instead.) Creature cards in your graveyard have haste.

card.name: Overt Operative
card.property: Menace Whenever Overt Operative deals combat damage to a player, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: "Rumors of My Death . . ."
card.property: {3} {B}, Exile a permanent you control with a League of Dastardly Doom watermark: Return a permanent card with a League of Dastardly Doom watermark from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Skull Saucer
card.property: Flying When Skull Saucer enters the battlefield, destroy target creature and put your head on the table. Sacrifice Skull Saucer when your head stops touching the table.

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it with the longest name. That player discards that card.

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target creature facing left in its art. (Creatures without faces don't face anywhere.)

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player loses a finger until Sly Spy leaves the battlefield. (The finger is chosen by its owner and can't roll dice or touch cards.)

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target creature facing right in its art. (Creatures without faces don't face anywhere.)

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals the top card of their library. Put that card into your hand and you lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Sly Spy
card.property: Whenever Sly Spy deals combat damage to a player, roll a six-sided die. That player loses life equal to the result.

card.name: Snickering Squirrel

card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) {B/P}{B/P}{B/P}{B/P}: Reveal a card you own from outside the game that has been banned or restricted in a Constructed format and put it into your hand.

card.name: Squirrel-Powered Scheme

card.name: Summon the Pack

card.property: {4} {B}: Combine Zombified from your graveyard with target host. {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Augment {4}{B} ({4}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: The Countdown Is at One
card.property: Players play a Magic subgame, starting at 1 life and using their libraries as their decks. For the rest of the main game, if a source would deal damage to a player who didn't win the subgame, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

card.name: Feisty Stegosaurus
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. This creature deals damage equal to the result to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: Frenzy 2 (Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.) Garbage Elemental can't be blocked by wordy creatures. (A creature is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.)

card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.) Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.) When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the difference between those results.

card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) When Garbage Elemental enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Garbage Elemental deals damage equal to the result to target opponent or planeswalker.

card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) card.name: Garbage Elemental
card.property: Last strike (This creature deals combat damage after creatures without last strike.) Battalion — Whenever Garbage Elemental and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Other creatures you control wearing hats in their art have menace.

card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature and roll a six-sided die. Until end of turn, it gains haste and gets +X/+0, where X is the result.

card.name: Ineffable Blessing
card.property: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose an artist. Whenever a creature with art by the chosen artist enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.property: As Ineffable Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a number. Whenever a creature with exactly the chosen number of words in its name enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. (Hyphenated words are one word.)

card.name: Joyride Rigger
card.property: When Joyride Rigger enters the battlefield, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Monkey-
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Augment {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mother Kangaroo
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the result.

card.name: Multi-Headed
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if you rolled a die this turn, Augment {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Really Epic Punch
card.property: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 if it's a host or has augment. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Selfie Preservation
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and reveal it. If there's a tree in its art, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Serpentine
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Augment {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shellephant
card.property: {0}: Choose one. You may activate this ability while Shellephant is in any zone. • Shellephant has base power and toughness 1/4. • Shellephant has base power and toughness 3/3.

card.name: Slaying Mantis
card.property: Just a second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't move cards on the battlefield.) Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield by being thrown from a distance of at least three feet. When Slaying Mantis enters the battlefield, it fights each creature an opponent controls that it touched as it entered.

card.name: Squirrel Dealer
card.property: When Squirrel Dealer enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game "Do you like Squirrels?" If they do, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

card.name: Steamflogger Service Rep
card.property: Whenever another Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, Steamflogger Service Rep assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Wild Crocodile
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Willing Test Subject
card.property: Reach Whenever you roll a 4 or higher on a die, put a +1/+1 counter on Willing Test Subject. {6}: Roll a six-sided die.

card.name: Baron Von Count
card.property: Baron Von Count enters the battlefield with a doom counter on "5." Whenever you cast a spell with the indicated numeral in its mana cost, text box, power, or toughness, move the doom counter one numeral to the left. When the doom counter moves from "1," destroy target player and put that doom counter on "5."

card.name: Better Than One
card.property: A person outside the game becomes your teammate. (Choose any number of cards in your hand, on top of your library, or on the battlefield under your control. Those cards become your teammate's hand, library, and permanents, respectively.)

card.name: Cramped Bunker
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player moves a permanent they control to touch Cramped Bunker and no other permanents. If the player can't, destroy each permanent they control that isn't touching Cramped Bunker, then sacrifice it.

card.name: Dr. Julius Jumblemorph
card.property: Dr. Julius Jumblemorph is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield). Whenever a host enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card with augment and combine it with that host. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

card.name: The Grand Calcutron
card.property: The Grand Calcutron can be your commander. When The Grand Calcutron enters the battlefield, each player's hand becomes a program (an ordered row of revealed cards). Players can only play the first card of their program. If a card would be put into a player's hand from anywhere, that player reveals it and places it anywhere within their program instead. At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player's program has fewer than five cards, they draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Grusilda, Monster Masher
card.property: Combined, enchanted, and equipped creatures you control have menace. {3}{B}{R}, {T}: Put two target creature cards from graveyards onto the battlefield combined into one creature under your control. (Its power is equal to their total power, its toughness is equal to their total toughness, and it has their names, mana costs, types, text boxes, etc.)

card.name: Hot Fix
card.property: You have ten seconds to look at and rearrange the cards in your library. At the end of those ten seconds, if you're touching one or more of those cards, shuffle.

card.name: Ol' Buzzbark
card.property: When Ol' Buzzbark enters the battlefield, roll X six-sided dice onto the battlefield from a height of at least X inches. For each die, put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the result on each creature you control that die is touching. For each die, Ol' Buzzbark deals damage equal to the result to each creature an opponent controls that die is touching.

card.name: Phoebe, Head of S.N.E.A.K.
card.property: Phoebe, Head of S.N.E.A.K. can't be blocked by creatures with flavor text. {2}{U}{B}: Phoebe permanently steals target creature's text box. (That creature loses all rules text, flavor text, and watermarks. This creature gains them.)

card.name: Urza, Academy Headmaster

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: +1: Head to AskUrza.com and click +1. −1: Head to AskUrza.com and click -1. −6: Head to AskUrza.com and click -6.

card.name: X
card.property: As long as X is in X's owner's opponent's hand, X's owner may cast X and activate X's abilities. That opponent can't cast X and plays with their hand revealed. {U}{B}, {T}: Put X into target opponent's hand. {3}{U}{B}: You may play a land or cast a spell from the hand X is in. If you cast a spell this way, you cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mary O'Kill
card.property: {1} {B/R}: Switch a Killbot or Mary O'Kill in your hand with one on the battlefield. (If a creature is tapped, the switched creature is tapped. The same is true for untapped, attacking, blocking, enchanted, equipped, and targeted. Any counters on a creature are on the switched creature instead.)

card.name: Angelic Rocket
card.property: Flying When this creature enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Border Guardian
card.property: Whenever you cast a silver-bordered spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Border Guardian. Whenever you cast a black-bordered spell, Border Guardian can't be blocked this turn. Whenever you cast a white-bordered spell, Border Guardian gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Buzzing Whack-a-Doodle
card.property: As Buzzing Whack-a-Doodle enters the battlefield, you and an opponent each secretly choose Whack or Doodle. Then those choices are revealed. If the choices match, Buzzing Whack-a-Doodle has that ability. Otherwise, it has Buzz. • Whack — {T}: Target player loses 2 life. • Doodle — {T}: You gain 3 life. • Buzz — {2}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Clock of DOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
card.property: {4}, {T}: Move the CRANK! counter to your Contraption deck's next sprocket and crank any number of that sprocket's Contraptions.

card.name: Cogmentor
card.property: Flying {4}: Reassemble target Contraption you control. (Move it onto another one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Contraption Cannon
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice Contraption Cannon: It deals damage to any target equal to the number of Contraptions you control.

card.name: Entirely Normal Armchair
card.property: During your turn, if Entirely Normal Armchair is in your hand, you may hide it on the battlefield. {0}: Return Entirely Normal Armchair to its owner's hand. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only if they see Entirely Normal Armchair. {2}, Sacrifice Entirely Normal Armchair: Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: {2}, {T}: Move a counter from one permanent onto another. If the second permanent refers to any kind of counter, the moved counter becomes one of those counters. Otherwise, it becomes a +1/+1 counter. {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have no cards in hand. {8}, {T}: You gain 10 life. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Everythingamajig: You may put a silver-bordered permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {C}{C}. Activate only as an instant. {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn. {X}: Everythingamajig becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}, {T}: Say the flavor text on a card in your hand. Target opponent guesses that card's name. You may reveal that card. If you do and your opponent guessed wrong, draw a card. {8}, {T}: Everythingamajig deals 12 damage to target creature.

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life. Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}. {2}, Discard a card: Search your library for a card that shares a complete word in its name with the name of the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Everythingamajig
card.property: {1}, {T}: Scry 2. {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Everythingamajig: Choose target player. At the beginning of the next end step, exchange life totals with that player, exchange control of all permanents you and that player control, and exchange cards in your hands, cards in your libraries, and cards in your graveyards.

card.name: Gnome-Made Engine
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.

card.name: Handy Dandy Clone Machine
card.property: {2}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Homunculus creature token. It must be represented by a unique hand and two fingers at all times, or it ceases to exist.

card.name: Kindslaver
card.property: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Kindslaver: A person outside the game controls target player during that player's next turn. Neither player may advise that person until the end of that turn.

card.name: Krark's Other Thumb
card.property: If you would roll a die, instead roll two of those dice and ignore one of those results.

card.name: Labro Bot
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, return target host card or card with augment from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Lobe Lobber
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Roll a six-sided die. On a 5 or higher, untap it." Equip {2}

card.property: {T}: Roll a six-sided die. On a 3 or lower, target player adds {C}. Otherwise, that player adds one mana of any color they choose.

card.name: Modular Monstrosity
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you have five seconds to choose a keyword you haven't chosen for a card named Modular Monstrosity today that's been printed on a creature card. If you do, Modular Monstrosity gains that ability. Otherwise, Modular Monstrosity loses all keyword abilities.

card.name: Proper Laboratory Attire
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has protection from die rolls. (Nothing that lets a player roll a die can block, target, deal damage to, or attach to equipped creature.) Equip {2}

card.name: Robo-
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, Augment {2} ({2}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Split Screen
card.property: When Split Screen enters the battlefield, shuffle your library and deal it into four libraries. If anything refers to your library, choose one of your libraries for it. Play with your libraries' top cards revealed. When Split Screen leaves the battlefield, shuffle your libraries together.

card.name: Staff of the Letter Magus
card.property: As Staff of the Letter Magus enters the battlefield, choose a consonant other than N, R, S, or T. Whenever a player casts a spell, you gain 1 life for each time the chosen letter appears in that spell's name.

card.name: Stamp of Approval
card.property: As Stamp of Approval enters the battlefield, choose a watermark. Creatures you control with the chosen watermark get +1/+1.

Voracious Vacuum
card.property: When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Watermarket
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with watermarks.

card.name: Accessories to Murder
card.property: Whenever you crank Accessories to Murder, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Applied Aeronautics
card.property: Whenever you crank Applied Aeronautics, until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0, gains flying, and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Arms Depot
card.property: Whenever you crank Arms Depot, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Auto-Key
card.property: Whenever you crank Auto-Key, until end of turn, target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types and gains "{T}: You gain 3 life."

card.name: Bee-Bee Gun
card.property: Whenever you crank Bee-Bee Gun, until end of turn, target creature gains "{2}: This creature fights another target creature."

card.name: Boomflinger
card.property: Whenever you crank Boomflinger, roll two six-sided dice. Boomflinger deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the difference between those results.

card.name: Buzz Buggy
card.property: Whenever you crank Buzz Buggy, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Deadly Poison Sampler
card.property: Whenever you crank Deadly Poison Sampler, until end of turn, target creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy target creature that player controls."

card.name: Dictation Quillograph
card.property: Whenever you crank Dictation Quillograph, until end of turn, target creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card."

card.name: Dispatch Dispensary
card.property: Whenever you crank Dispatch Dispensary, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token with menace.

card.name: Division Table
card.property: Whenever you crank Division Table, target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Dogsnail Engine
card.property: Whenever you crank Dogsnail Engine, target player gains life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Dual Doomsuits
card.property: Whenever you crank Dual Doomsuits, each time a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Duplication Device
card.property: Whenever you crank Duplication Device, until end of turn, target creature becomes a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Faerie Aerie
card.property: Whenever you crank Faerie Aerie, create two 1/1 blue Faerie Spy creature tokens with flying, haste, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Genetic Recombinator
card.property: Whenever you crank Genetic Recombinator, up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Gift Horse
card.property: Whenever you crank Gift Horse, roll two six-sided dice. Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the difference between those results.

card.name: Gnomeball Machine
card.property: Whenever you crank Gnomeball Machine, create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.

card.name: Goblin Slingshot
card.property: Whenever you crank Goblin Slingshot, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Guest List
card.property: Whenever you crank Guest List, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

card.name: Hard Hat Area
card.property: Whenever you crank Hard Hat Area, roll two six-sided dice. Hard Hat Area assembles a number of Contraptions equal to the difference between those results. (To assemble a Contraption, put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)

card.name: Head Banger
card.property: Whenever you crank Head Banger, target creature must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Hypnotic Swirly Disc
card.property: Whenever you crank Hypnotic Swirly Disc, target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Inflation Station
card.property: Whenever you crank Inflation Station, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Insufferable Syphon
card.property: Whenever you crank Insufferable Syphon, target player discards a card.

card.name: Jamming Device
card.property: Whenever you crank Jamming Device, creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Lackey Recycler
card.property: Whenever you crank Lackey Recycler, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Mandatory Friendship Shackles
card.property: Whenever you crank Mandatory Friendship Shackles, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Neural Network
card.property: Whenever you crank Neural Network, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Oaken Power Suit
card.property: Whenever you crank Oaken Power Suit, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Optical Optimizer
card.property: Whenever you crank Optical Optimizer, until end of turn, target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types and gains "{T}: Draw a card."

card.name: Pet Project
card.property: Whenever you crank Pet Project, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Quick-Stick Lick Trick
card.property: Whenever you crank Quick-Stick Lick Trick, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Rapid Prototyper
card.property: Whenever you crank Rapid Prototyper, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Record Store
card.property: Whenever you crank Record Store, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Refibrillator
card.property: Whenever you crank Refibrillator, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sap Sucker
card.property: Whenever you crank Sap Sucker, add {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Sundering Fork
card.property: Whenever you crank Sundering Fork, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Targeting Rocket
card.property: Whenever you crank Targeting Rocket, target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Thud-for-Duds
card.property: Whenever you crank Thud-for-Duds, roll two six-sided dice. Thud-for-Duds deals damage to target creature equal to the difference between those results.

card.name: Top-Secret Tunnel
card.property: Whenever you crank Top-Secret Tunnel, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Tread Mill
card.property: Whenever you crank Tread Mill, until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+2, gains vigilance, and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Turbo-Thwacking Auto-Hammer
card.property: Whenever you crank Turbo-Thwacking Auto-Hammer, target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Twiddlestick Charger
card.property: Whenever you crank Twiddlestick Charger, tap or untap target creature.

card.name: Widget Contraption
card.property: Whenever you crank Widget Contraption, it assembles a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
